amendment.description: To increase funding for the Children's Hospitals Graduate Medical Education Program under the Public Health Service Act for fiscal year 2007.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3083 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3083 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator DeWine. (consideration: CR S2261-2262; text: CR S2262) To increase funding for the Children's Hospitals Graduate Medical Education Program under the Public Health Service Act for fiscal year 2007.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3083 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3083 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator DeWine.
